Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Mix in molasses and buttermilk. Stir in raisins or currants. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
